history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: rel_all_relim. sfirstorder depth: 3. qsimpl time: 1 use: rel_all_relim,relim.

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type B : Type C : Type R : C -> rel A B x : A y : B P, Q : Prop H : forall c : C, RElim (R c) x y P Q Unable to unify "forall c : ?C, ?M1627 c ?M1628 ?M1629" with "exists c : C, R c x y".

In environment A : Type B : Type C : Type R : C -> rel A B x : A y : B P, Q : Prop H : forall c : C, RElim (R c) x y P Q H0 : forall (R : Q -> rel Q Q) (x y : Q) (P Q0 : Prop), (exists c : Q, RElim (R c) x y P Q0) -> RElim (rforall y, R y) x y P Q0 H2 : R ?c x y -> P -> Q H1 : forall (R : Q -> rel Q Q) (x y : Q) (P Q0 : Prop), (exists c : Q, RElim (R c) x y P Q0) -> RElim (rforall y, R y) x y P Q0 y0 : ?M2665 ?M2666 ?M2667 ?M2668 Unable to unify "exists c : ?C, ?M2665 c ?M2667 ?M2668" with "P -> Q".

original: intros H. apply rel_all_relim. exists (fun c => relim (H c)). apply rel_ex_rintro. reflexivity.
